name: ATM Industry Association
goal: As an independent, non-profit trade association, engaged in non-competitive promotion of our industry, our mission is: to promote ATM convenience, growth and usage worldwide; to protect the ATM industry's assets, interests, good name and public trust; and to provide education, best practices, political voice and networking opportunities for member organizations.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: All initiatives related to payments - functionality, security are key
